title: Moderna Vaccine Highly Effective in Adolescents, Company Says
author: The New York Times
description: Moderna Vaccine Highly Effective in Adolescents, Company Says sean o'leary ACCORDS
sitename: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus
cleaned_text: against the virus is really going to limit spread in school to a great degree," said Dr. Sean O'Leary, a pediatric infectious disease expert at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus. "It potentially could even change mask requirements for school, depending on the level of vaccination uptake. I'm looking forward to a much different school year next year, primarily because of vaccination." CU Anschutz CU Medicine Building 13199
